Sysid1458×511 32.1 KB
Sysid31284×302 71.5 KB
Sysid4752×441 59.8 KB

What version of sysid? (What does Info | About say). You need to be using 2022.3.1. You are clicking Deploy within sysid, correct?

Hope you’re doing great.

The sysid version is 2022.1.1. And yes I do click Deploy within sysid.
